snippet: Two Saudi women detained since Dec. 1 for challenging the conservative kingdom’s ban on female drivers announced on Thursday that they were free.
lead_paragraph: Two Saudi women detained since Dec. 1 for challenging the conservative kingdom’s ban on female drivers announced on Thursday that they were free.

headline.main: Saudi Women Free After 73 Days in Jail for Driving

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
